Text.val: 08.04.2014 JH SCR18818 Changed max sixe of <Ustrd> to 140 and deleted end task condition of Updatev.<Ustrd> (PAID)

05.11.2013 JH SCR18497 Added PAIN_SEPA_SEQ_TP handling and removed usage of DEBC

23.04.2012 SH SCR17210 Added new tag <ChrgBr>; Added task to replace characters semicolon/underscore with blank;
Removed UFB535 to strip XML reserved characters
... get directory (27 = template directory for XML files)
.. in case of directory does not exists --> Error
-- Delete all rows from temp table 'TEMP_BAD005SEPA'

TXT.val: @ Special reserved XML characters have not be be replaced

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/PAIN where PAIN_RUNNUMBER = :2 for fetch only
